articles.content: Researchers in Italy say their study of people infected with COVID-19 shows that those with certain genetic variations attributable to Neanderthal ancestry were far more likely to experience severe s… [+1249 chars]

articles.title: Apple CEO Tim Cook on creating a clean energy future - CBS News
articles.description: His goal is for the company to be carbon neutral in just seven years – and he wants other companies to copy Apple's clean energy efforts by demonstrating it makes good business sense.
